p: All results were expressed as the mean Â± SEM. Graphs were prepared using GraphPad Prism 5.0. (GraphPad Software, San Diego, CA, USA) Significant differences between treatments were evaluated by the one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) and the least significant difference (LSD) test at p < 0.05 using SPSS 19.0 (IBM, Armonk, NY, USA).
